Posts.Content: My mum has recently received chemotherapy & radiotherapy for breast cancer and completed this around 5 months ago however for the past 11 weeks my mum has been suffering with nausea / vomiting, the hospital have ran several tests and they all seem fine, has anyone else experienced this?
Posts.Title: SICKNESS / NAUSEA 5 MONTHS AFTER CHEMO & RADIOTHERAPY

Posts.Content: my mum has been on quite alot of sickness medication but it seems a little strange as the sickness happens in a morning after breakfast but when she is in hospital the sickness medication seems to work, do you think this could be physiological?
Posts.Title: SICKNESS / NAUSEA 5 MONTHS AFTER CHEMO & RADIOTHERAPY

Posts.Content: also my mum was started on tamoxifen but has been taken off them around 3 weeks ago in case this was a cause of sickness
Posts.Title: SICKNESS / NAUSEA 5 MONTHS AFTER CHEMO & RADIOTHERAPY

Posts.Content: Yes that is what i think but the doctors haven't asked her or mentioned anything of the sort just said they cannot find anything, i don't know how i can approach this with my mum as she keeps telling everyone this is not in her head.
Posts.Title: SICKNESS / NAUSEA 5 MONTHS AFTER CHEMO & RADIOTHERAPY
